text: Rose Fawai "Rosie" Sambiru (born 24 December 2000) is a Solomon Islands women's footballer who plays as a defender for Koloale. ==Career== Sambiru made her international debut for the Solomon Islands on 4 December 2017, starting in the 2017 Pacific Mini Games match against Vanuatu. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !colspan=3|Solomon Islands |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2017||4||0 |- |2018||3||0 |- !Total!!7!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile at oceaniafootball.com Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Solomon Islands women's footballers Category:Solomon Islands women's international footballers Category:Women's association football defenders
title: Rosie Sambiru
